Title: Stop Mapping in .NET Use Facets Instead
Author: Nick Chapsas
Description:
Get 30% off everything on Dometrain: https://dometrain.com/courses/?ref=nick-chapsas&promo=youtube&coupon\_code=SUMMER30 Subscribe to my weekly newsletter: https://nickchapsas.com

Hello, everybody. I'm Nick, and in this video, I will introduce you to Facet, a library that aims to replace traditional mappers with a more complete approach that includes typed LINQ projections without overhead.

Give Facet a star on GitHub: https://github.com/Tim-Maes/Facet
